actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend the Act of October 13, 1949, relating to the conveyance of certain land to the city and county of San Francisco, Calif.

summary.text: Authorizes the conveyance of specified Federal land to the city and county of San Francisco, California, to permit the use of such land, formerly designated "for public park and recreational purposes," for "public purposes."

titles.title: A bill to amend the Act of October 13, 1949, relating to the conveyance of certain land to the city and county of San Francisco, Calif.
